channel.title: LMS on LiaScript
channel.description: Recent content in LMS on LiaScript

item.title: Open Educational Ressources (OER) - Vision, Vorteile und praktische Umsetzung mit LiaScript und OPAL
item.description: Gemeinsam mit Studenten Lehrmaterialien erstellen und diese unter einer freien OER Lizenz teilen.

item.title: From Hero to Zero with Learning Management Systems
item.description: Why and How LMSs fail in distributing knowledge Abstract: Learning Management Systems provide more restrictions than access to educational resources and developing courses with the offered authoring tools is more tedious and intimidating task than a creative one.
